too_many_extensions_header: You cannot request another extension using this service
too_many_extensions_paragraph_one: You have requested and been given 2 extensions. You cannot request any more using this service.
too_many_extensions_paragraph_two: If you want to request another extension, you'll need to provide supporting evidence using an online form instead. You must do this before your current deadline has passed.
too_many_extensions_request_submit_text: Submit your request and supporting evidence using this online form
